Title: Third Challenge of Tyr: Persistence Embodied
Description:
Your third challenge was meant to have you overcome unfavorable odds. It was to help show me your persistence in all matters.

I believe fighting djaradin and fixing my statue with the expectation that I would issue you a challenge is more than sufficient to fulfill your victory condition. 

<You think you catch a small smile play across her lips.>
ObjectivesText: Accept the Bottled Essence from Maiden of Inspiration.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Accept the reward from Maiden of Inspiration.
